blogPost.excerpt: LiveChat newest integration with Mailchimp helps you get in touch with your website visitors by displaying an interactive greeting that allows them to sign up to your newsletter list.
blogPost.body: LiveChat newest integration with Mailchimp helps you get in touch with your website visitors by displaying an interactive greeting that allows them to sign up to your newsletter list.
blogPost.title: Mailchimp Newsletters widget by LiveChat - Get more newsletter signups from your website
blogPost.author: Agnieszka

localize.description: livechat最新集成了Mail猩猩，通过显示交互式问候语帮助您与网站访问者取得联系，允许他们注册您的时事通讯列表。
localize.tagline: 从您的网站获取更多时事通讯注册

localize.description: livechat最新集成了Mail猩猩，通過顯示交互式問候語幫助您與網站訪問者取得聯繫，允許他們註冊您的時事通訊列表。
localize.tagline: 從您的網站獲取更多時事通訊註冊

previous.excerpt: Like a fitness tracker for your code. Our contribution analytics empower devs with insight. Let the code speak for itself with dashboards & badges focused on self-improvement & career growth. See where you measure up & translate commits into insights.
previous.title: Merico Build - Free analytics to level up your code & career

localize.description: 就像代码的健康跟踪器一样。我们的贡献分析为开发人员提供了洞察力。让代码用仪表板和徽章为自己说话，这些仪表板和徽章侧重于自我提升和职业发展。看一看你的衡量标准&把承诺转化为洞察力。
localize.tagline: 免费分析，提升您的代码和职业水平

localize.description: 就像代碼的健康跟蹤器一樣。我們的貢獻分析爲開發人員提供了洞察力。讓代碼用儀表板和徽章爲自己說話，這些儀表板和徽章側重於自我提升和職業發展。看一看你的衡量標準&把承諾轉化爲洞察力。
localize.tagline: 免費分析，提升您的代碼和職業水平

next.excerpt: Kudos is the easiest way to celebrate wins with your team and align everyone around your core values. Create reward systems and encourage a culture of positive feedback across the company, right from your favorite chat platform.
next.title: Kudos by DailyBot - Give positive feedback and align team+culture with Kudos.

localize.description: 表扬是与你的团队一起庆祝胜利，并让每个人都围绕着你的核心价值观取得胜利的最简单的方式。创建奖励系统，鼓励整个公司的积极反馈文化，就在你最喜欢的聊天平台上。
localize.tagline: 给予积极反馈，使团队+文化与Kudos保持一致。

localize.description: 表揚是與你的團隊一起慶祝勝利，並讓每個人都圍繞着你的核心價值觀取得勝利的最簡單的方式。創建獎勵系統，鼓勵整個公司的積極反饋文化，就在你最喜歡的聊天平臺上。
localize.tagline: 給予積極反饋，使團隊+文化與Kudos保持一致。
